result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Andre Augustus Body

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Andre Augustus Body appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Brett Lee Copeland appeared by video for Andre Augustus Body.  Attorney John J Rejowski appeared by video for State of Wisconsin. 

**JUDGE FEISS AND ALL PARTIES APPEARED VIA ZOOM VIDEO CONFERENCE.** 
Case in Court for Scheduling Conference. Discussion placed on the record. Defense received discovery material and an offer from the State. Defense requested Final PreTrial and Jury Trial dates. Court ordered parties to submit their Motions in Limine, Jury Instructions, and Witness Lists by the Final PreTrial date. Any Motions are due by the Final PreTrial date. If the parties believe a necessary witness for the State or Defense requires independent representation, they are to make arrangements for that representation through the Public Defender's Office two (2) weeks in advance of the Final PreTrial. Court ordered case adjourned for Final PreTrial and Jury Trial. Case remains calendared in Branch 46. 

Final PreTrial scheduled for November 11, 2022 at 9:45 am. Hearing will be held via Zoom Video Conference.
Jury Trial scheduled for December 12, 2022 at 09:00 am. Trial will be held in Room 113 of the Safety Building.

Attorney Brett Lee Copeland in Court, Defendant Andre Augustus Body not in Court, in custody.  John J Rejowski appeared for the State of Wisconsin.

HELD OFF THE RECORD VIA ZOOM VIDEO CONFERENCE.
Case in Court for Scheduling Conference. Clerk previously made arrangements for Defendant to appear via Zoom; however, Defendant did not appear for today's hearing. Defense provided an update to the Court regarding discovery material issues. Case adjourned for Scheduling Conference, Branch 46. Scheduling Conference scheduled for September 16, 2022 at 09:15 am. Hearing will be held via Zoom Video Conference.

Defendant Andrea Augustus Body in court with attorney Brett Lee Copeland.  Defendant Andrea Augustus Body in custody.  John J Rejowski appeared for the State of Wisconsin.

Case in Court for Status hearing. Defendant appeared via Zoom Video Conference.  Discussion placed on the record. Defense has received Discovery materials, but has not received an Offer Letter from the State. State confirmed and will be sending an Offer to the Defense Attorney. Defense requested time to review Offer letter and Discovery. Court granted request. Court ordered case adjourned for Scheduling hearing. Case remains calendared in Branch 46. . Court ordered Defense and State to meet/talk at least 48 hours in advance of the next hearing. Scheduling Conference scheduled for August 12, 2022 at 09:30 am. Hearing will be held via Zoom Video Conference.

Defendant Andre Augustus Body in Court with Attorney Brett Lee Copeland.  Defendant Andre Augustus Body in custody. Jacob Daniel Corr on behalf of Ian F Vance-Curzan appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  

**PARTIES APPEARED VIA ZOOM VIDEO CONFERENCE.**  
Case in Court for Bail/Bond hearing. Discussion placed on the record. Due to the nature of the charges, Victim Notification is not required. Arguments heard regarding bail. For reasons stated on the record, Court DENIED Defense Motion to Modify Bail. 

Defense received discovery material; however, has NOT received an offer from the State. Court ordered case adjourned for Status hearing. Case remains calendared in Branch 46. Status hearing scheduled for July 12, 2022 at 08:30 am. Defendant will appear via Zoom Video Conference.

Request for Substitution of Judge received and filed.  Court consented to substitution against Judge Hanrahan.  Parties are advised the Clerk of Circuit Court reassigned case pursuant to current court rules to Judge Feiss, Br. 46.

Defendant Andre Augustus Body in court with Attorney Brett Lee Copeland; both appear by video.  Defendant Andre Augustus Body in custody.  Patrick O'Keefe appeared in person for the State of Wisconsin.  
Preliminary hearing proceeded.  Sworn for the State: Special Agent A. Sheridan. State rests.  Defense rests.  Defense motion to dismiss argued and denied. Court found probable cause and bound defendant over for trial.  Original information received and filed;  defendant given a copy, waived reading, was arraigned in open court and plead not guilty.  Defense to be heard on bail on the next date. Case is adjourned to Branch 46.  Bail/bond hearing scheduled for June 1, 2022 at 10:00 am.

Defendant Andre Augustus Body not in court, defendant in custody.  Ian Vance-Curzan appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Case set for a preliminary hearing. States witness is present. SPD has not appointed counsel. Court ordered case adjourned for CAUSE for a Preliminary Hearing in Preliminary Hearing Court, Room 146 of the Criminal Justice Facility.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for May 27, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION Level 3.
  No possession of any controlled substance without a valid prescription.

Defendant Andre Augustus Body in court with attorney Kylie Kaltenberg.  Defendant Andre Augustus Body in custody.  Adam Joseph Best appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Hanrahan, Branch 04. Defendant given a copy of the complaint and advised of maximum penalties, right to counsel and right to a preliminary hearing.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause to hold the defendant for further proceedings.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND PUBLIC DEFENDER WILL PROVIDE COUNSEL.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for April 26, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

ADDRESS INFO for Andre Augustus Body
Current: 4812 W. Grant Place., Milwaukee, WI 53216   (Effective: 04-16-2022)
Prior: 6333 West Carmen Avenue #5, Milwaukee, WI 53218
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
